#### create markdown file - montage plots

## Application 3
```{r}
for (amount in c("10min", "30min")){
  pipeline_list <- c("cpac_default_all_gsr", "cpac_fmriprep_all_gsr", "cpac_ccs_all_gsr", "cpac_abcd_all_gsr")
  for (pipeline1 in pipeline_list){
    for (pipeline2 in pipeline_list){
      if (pipeline1!=pipeline2){
        prefix <- sprintf('PipelineComp%s_%s-%s', amount, pipeline1, pipeline2)
        cat(sprintf('    GSR(%s): %s vs %s\n', amount, pipeline1, pipeline2))
        cat('\n')
        cat(sprintf('![](Application3-5/results_cpac_HNU/ROI_Schaefer200/rex_icc_comp/%s_ReX_CompareICC_ChangeOfVariation_Raw.png)\n', prefix))
        cat(sprintf('![](Application3-5/results_cpac_HNU/ROI_Schaefer200/rex_icc_comp/%s_ReX_CompareICC_ChangeOfVariation_Normalized_GradientFlow.png)\n', prefix))
        cat('\n')
      }
    }
  }
  pipeline_list <- c("cpac_default_all",  "cpac_fmriprep_all",  "cpac_ccs_all", "cpac_abcd_all")
  for (pipeline1 in pipeline_list){
    for (pipeline2 in pipeline_list){
      if (pipeline1!=pipeline2){
        prefix <- sprintf('PipelineComp%s_%s-%s', amount, pipeline1, pipeline2)
        cat(sprintf('    GSR(%s): %s vs %s\n', amount, pipeline1, pipeline2))
        cat('\n')
        cat(sprintf('![](Application3-5/results_cpac_HNU/ROI_Schaefer200/rex_icc_comp/%s_ReX_CompareICC_ChangeOfVariation_Raw.png)\n', prefix))
        cat(sprintf('![](Application3-5/results_cpac_HNU/ROI_Schaefer200/rex_icc_comp/%s_ReX_CompareICC_ChangeOfVariation_Normalized_GradientFlow.png)\n', prefix))
        cat('\n')
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Application 4
```{r}
pipeline_list <- c("cpac_default_all",  "cpac_fmriprep_all",  "cpac_ccs_all", "cpac_abcd_all")

for (amount in c("10min", "30min")){
  for (pipeline in pipeline_list){

        prefix <- sprintf('GSR-NOGSR_%s_%s', amount, pipeline)
        cat(sprintf('GSR vs NOGSR (%s): %s\n', amount, pipeline))
        cat('\n')
        cat(sprintf('![](Application3-5/results_cpac_HNU/ROI_Schaefer200/rex_icc_plotN/%s_%s_NOGSR_GSR.png)\n', pipeline, amount))
        cat('\n')
        cat(sprintf('![](Application3-5/results_cpac_HNU/ROI_Schaefer200/rex_icc_comp/%s_ReX_CompareICC_ChangeOfVariation_Raw.png)\n', prefix))
        cat('\n')
        cat(sprintf('![](Application3-5/results_cpac_HNU/ROI_Schaefer200/rex_icc_comp/%s_ReX_CompareICC_ChangeOfVariation_Normalized_GradientFlow.png)\n', prefix))
        cat('\n')
  }
    
}
```
